description: Inverse warp tool from FSL suite

refvol.title: Reference volume file
refvol.description: Filename for new reference image, i.e., what was originally the input image (determines inverse warpvol's FOV and pixdims)

relflag.title: Relative warp convention flag
relflag.description: Use relative warp convention: x' = x + w(x)

absflag.title: Absolute warp convention flag
absflag.description: Use absolute warp convention (default): x' = w(x)

noconstraintflag.title: No Jacobian constraint flag
noconstraintflag.description: Do not apply the Jacobian constraint

jmin.title: Minimum Jacobian value
jmin.description: Minimum acceptable Jacobian value for constraint (default 0.01)

jmax.title: Maximum Jacobian value
jmax.description: Maximum acceptable Jacobian value for constraint (default 100.0)
